review: I wanted another smart tv without having to buy another set.  Chromecast is the perfect solution.  It works beautifully.  I look forward to the day more options become available.  Knowing the power of Google the wait should not be that long.  Another plus is that the device is portable and can be used on any TV in the house with a HDMI port.Chromecast is easy to set up and easy to use.  So much so that I didn't have to "consult" with my 20 something sons for help.  Keep on innovating Google and thanks.
author: MWW "MWW"

review: Love it! I would recommend anybody to get it! It is simple-EST-EST-EST device that you could use, easy to set up and easy to control.
author: Prof Inuyasha

review: This pile of garbage simply gives you a wireless connection to stream from your device through only Chromecast enabled apps. Hell, I can do this with an HDMI wireless device and stream anything that is on my screen. I thought that this would have the HBO Go app built in where I could simply stream through this unit but found out that I still have to stream from my laptop which I was doing with an HDMI cable to begin with. Another worthless product from Google, go figure!
author: Joel K.

review: This is the best streaming device that is available.period. I never wrote a review for any product. But wanted to write a review for the chromecast. The device is simple to install and setup. Features like add to TV queue are really helpful.

review: Works better with netflix than if u just cast from chrome web page. Sometimes it won't connect and you have to adjust the TV to chromecast then send it from the browser. That's a pain.
author: deanna augusto

review: Very easy to use and set up. It works exactly as described. Mostly use for Netflix, which it is perfect for.
author: MPalmer

review: I bought my Samsung Led Lcd when they first came out. Only feature it had was it was able to tell you the weather, stocks and news when and Ethernet cable was plugged in. I upgraded to a newer Samsung Smart Tv but I still wanted to use my other samsung. Buying this Chromecast did the trick and it now streams everything just as great as my new Smart Tv. Dumb Tv now turned Smart. :)

review: Great service I will order through them again. It works great, and built very well. I would recommend this to a friend
author: J.K.

review: Worked for a week very well, 5 stars, but it just doesn't connect to the internet anymore and has too many bugs while trying to setup again.
author: Walter

review: The only reason I've given this a four instead of a five is because of its current issues it has with streaming local content, but that's a well documented issue and some solutions do exist, although a viable free one is hard to find. Plex seems to work the best, and will eventually be free, but currently requires a subscription to their premium service.As an aside, if you plan to use this through a vpn, it won't work unless you're using a vpn router. I found this out the hard way when I brought mine to China. However, that was due to my own lack of research so I'm not holding that against Google.
